name: Complex Courtship: A Cauchy Dating Sim
name_original: Complex Courtship: A Cauchy Dating Sim
description:
Have you ever dreamed of dating French mathematician, physicist, engineer, and legend Augustin-Louis Cauchy? Well, dream no more!

You are an ordinary college student, living an ordinary life--until today, that is. As you are running late to class, you bump into a mysterious man who asks for your help. Are your mathematical and interpersonal skills good enough to save the day--and all of complex analysis? Find out, and fall in love, in Complex Courtship. 

Testimonials:

"Cauchy Dating Sim takes you on a mathematical, historical and romantic adventure as you spend a fun day with Cauchy, one of the most influential mathematicians of the 19th century.” -Kai 

"I thought it was fun and a good way to make complex analysis accessible. The questions it raised about the relationship between science and the people who do it were interesting." -Ryan aka "Fartface" 

"I got to kiss Cauchy!" -Anna M-L
